You're a laid-back person who likes to take things slow.
For you, the best time is relaxing on the couch with a nice, cozy blanket.
You work hard, but only so you can be comfortable in your free time.
Whenever you do something intense or competitive, like sports, you'd prefer if everyone just had fun.
You aren't a fan of formality; you tend to keep things as casual as possible.
However, your attitude can sometimes make it seem like you don't care, even if you really do.
An easygoing person like you will be...
